body: Tattoos, piercings, and ritual scarification are sacred markings to many half-orcs. Half-orcs with this racial trait gain a +1 luck bonus on all saving throws. This racial trait replaces the orc ferocity racial trait.
name: Sacred Tattoo
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Races/Half-Orcs/Alternate Racial Traits/Sacred Tattoo
